titleStmt.title: A true declaration of our innocency who in scorn are called Quakers and how we are clear (if we have justice) from the penalties of the late act made against seditious meetings and conventicles as exprest in the preamble and reason of the said Act, &c. by J.S.
titleStmt.author: Stubbs, John, 1618?-1674.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
